item.title: Quantum Field Theory
item.description: These lecture notes cover the foundational concepts of Quantum Field Theory (QFT), focusing on quantizing classical fields and understanding particle interactions through the framework of quantum mechanics. Topics include second quantization, Feynman diagrams, and gauge symmetries.
